about_the_game:
As a space station attendant, you'll experience an accident that causes space to distort. You will encounter 6 mutated races, all of whom come from the world we know, but all of whom have gained wisdom and special abilities.
Players need to survive the confined space of the space station by acquiring the resources in their hands until the arrival of the rescue ship. Of course, you can also take a gamble and see if you can wait until the next shift, and the rewards will naturally be richer.
Come on, gamblers, space cowboys, people who don't know what race looks like a human, this little box of SPACE CUBT X is your forever home!!
detailed_description:
As a space station attendant, you'll experience an accident that causes space to distort. You will encounter 6 mutated races, all of whom come from the world we know, but all of whom have gained wisdom and special abilities.
Players need to survive the confined space of the space station by acquiring the resources in their hands until the arrival of the rescue ship. Of course, you can also take a gamble and see if you can wait until the next shift, and the rewards will naturally be richer.
Come on, gamblers, space cowboys, people who don't know what race looks like a human, this little box of SPACE CUBT X is your forever home!!
name: SPACE CUBE X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10及以上版本
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10及以上版本
  • Processor: Intel Core i3及以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: A card game with a light meat pigeon and space horror theme. The favorite art style of independent game gamblers is slightly retro, simple, and elegant. Come and have a round!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
